Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Grants the attorney general jurisdiction to investigate and prosecute police misconduct
Summary: Authorizes the attorney general to investigate and prosecute the alleged commission of any criminal offense or offenses committed by police officers in connection with the performance of their regular duties.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to granting the attorney general jurisdiction to investigate and prosecute police misconduct
